short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increases the size of the Picarto video player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picarto Player Enhance will change the CSS styling of the Picarto video player by removing margins and removing max-width. This will increase the video player size for better viewing experience without full-screen enabled.
